mapper.insert: INSERT INTO note(oli_no, m_no, title, content, price, classify) VALUES(#{oli_no}, #{m_no}, #{title}, #{content}, #{price}, #{classify})
mapper.select:
SELECT n.n_no, n.oli_no, n.m_no, n.title, n.content, n.price, n.reg_date, n.classify, TRUNCATE((SELECT AVG(star_rating) FROM note_reply nr WHERE nr.n_no = n.n_no),0) star_avg, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM note_like nl WHERE nl.n_no = n.n_no) like_cnt, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM note_reply nr WHERE nr.n_no = n.n_no) reply_cnt
GROUP BY n_no
ORDER BY n.n_no DESC
ORDER BY like_cnt DESC
ORDER BY reply_cnt DESC
ORDER BY star_avg DESC
ORDER BY price
ORDER BY n.n_no DESC
LIMIT #{page}, #{pageSize}
mapper.sql:
FROM note n, online_lecture_introduction oli, online_lecture_tag olt, online_lecture_sub_type olst WHERE n.oli_no = oli.oli_no AND n.oli_no = olt.oli_no AND n.oli_no = olst.oli_no
n.title LIKE '%${searchTitle}%'
AND
category_tag IN (SELECT sub_type_name FROM sub_type WHERE sub_type_no = olst.sub_type_no) OR category_tag IN (SELECT tag_name FROM tag WHERE tag_no = olt.tag_no)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM note WHERE oli_no = #{oli_no} AND m_no = #{m_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO note_reply(n_no, m_no, star_rating, content, reg_date) VALUES(#{n_no}, #{m_no}, #{star_rating}, #{content}, #{reg_date})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM note_like WHERE n_no = #{n_no} AND m_no = #{m_no}
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM note_like WHERE n_no = #{n_no} AND m_no = #{m_no})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO note_article(n_no, olv_no, title, content) VALUES(#{n_no}, #{olv_no}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM note_article WHERE n_no = #{n_no} AND olv_no = #{olv_no}
